message: Well after using it for a day (well I was not reading HN on the launch day so...) and having seen GroupMe (using Google voice) and the topics people are making here, I am starting to compare Google Groups with this. Just wonder, could projects actually replace GG with this? (except that in here you can easily hijack a Group-URL tuple as the admin from anyone just because you also use that name elsewhere)
We think we cover a lot of the use cases that Google Groups does, but we're slightly different.
but the problem is once I hit the 20 limit, such feeling is simply diminished.
@ericflo that's good to hear that, how about the reply-to thing?
